text: Hi does anybody know how to change the “reply to” text language in the comments section?, I’m just using the defualt comments module so it should just work I thought
Oh it’s not editable… 3 year old thread… <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/How-can-I-edit-the-comment-box-on-my-COS-Blog/td-p/5149>
